title: [Ruby and Copper]
description: The street narrows here between clumps of overgrown bushes, their gnarled branches groping toward you like the hairy tentacles of a hungry beast.  Several copper roofs peak above, thrusting their chimneys into the sky in defiant gesture against the unkempt state of their surroundings.

The street narrows here between clumps of overgrown bushes, their gnarled branches groping toward you like the hairy tentacles of a hungry beast.  Several copper roofs peak above, thrusting their bright red chimneys into the sky in defiant gesture against the unkempt state of their surroundings.
paths: Obvious paths: north, east, south, west
